column5: Measurement of atmospheric data. Provide atmospheric data name | measurement value. Can include multiple data. Free text - 500 characters.
Dissolved organic nitrogen concentration measured as; total dissolved nitrogen - NH4 - NO3 - NO2. Units are mg N/m^3 water. Enter a decimal number only.
Concentration of dissolved inorganic phosphorus. Units are mg P/m^3 water. Enter a decimal number only.
Measurement of light intensity. Enter a decimal number only.
Measurement of photon flux. Enter a decimal number only.
Measurement of primary production. Enter a decimal number only.
Concentration of soluble reactive phosphorus. Units are mg/m^3 water. Enter a decimal number only.
Concentration of suspended particulate matter. Units are mg/m^3 water. Enter a decimal number only.
Measurement of total depth of water column. Enter an integer number only.
Total inorganic nitrogen content. Units are mg N/m^3 water. Enter a decimal number only.
Total particulate carbon content. Units are mg C/m^3 water. Enter a decimal number only.

column6: calculated by: total phosphorus = total dissolved phosphorus + particulate phosphorus. Can also be measured without filtering
column7: reported as phosphorus. Units are mg P/m^3 water. Enter a decimal number only.
